entry.title: Doctors Transplanted a Pig Kidney Into a Person a Month Ago. It's Still Working.
entry.content: A genetically modified pig kidney transplanted into a brain-dead person has worked for 32 days and counting, advancing efforts to use animals to ease perennial shortages for humans.

entry.title: Ecuador's Newest Candidate Also Fears for His Life
entry.content: In an interview, Christian Zurita, who replaced assassinated candidate Fernando Villavicencio in the race for president, said he wears a bulletproof vest and has sent his family into hiding.
